| 16 | 3, 4, 15 | #P_ghmlin | |- ( ( N e. ( S GrpHom ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) /\ F e. P /\ G e. P ) -> ( N ` ( F ( +g ` S ) G ) ) = ( ( N ` F ) x. ( N ` G ) ) ) |
